properties.entry: INSERT INTO POST ( POST_NUM , POST_TYPE , POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT , POST_TAG , POST_SCOPE , POST_WRITER , POST_REGDATE , POST_TITLE_COLOR , POST_TITLE_SIZE , POST_THUMBNAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_POST.NEXTVAL , 1 , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT , POST_TAG , POST_COUNT , POST_REGDATE , POST_TITLE_COLOR , POST_TITLE_SIZE , POST_THUMBNAIL FROM POST WHERE POST_WRITER = ? AND POST_TYPE = 1 AND POST_STATUS = 'Y' AND POST_BLOCK = 'N' ORDER BY POST_REGDATE DESC
